original_text: And the Lord God of their fathers sent to them by his messengers, rising up betimes, and sending; because he had compassion on his people, and on his dwelling place:
korean_text: 그 조상들의 하나님 여호와께서 그의 백성과 그 거하시는 곳을 아끼사 부지런히 그의 사신들을 그 백성에게 보내어 이르셨으나

sentences.original_text: And the Lord God of their fathers
sent to them by his messengers
because he had compassion on his people
sentences.korean_translation: 그가 그의 백성에게 긍휼을 베풀었기 때문이다
